unicef-cp11.def: Women: percentage of women 15–49 years old who have undergone FGM; (Fb) girls: percentage of girls 0–14 years old who have undergone FGM (as reported by their mothers); (Fc) want the practice to stop: percentage of women and men 15–49 years old who have heard about FGM and think the practice should stop.
unicef-cp11.name: Female genital mutilation prevalence
unicef-cp11.source: DHS, MICS and other national surveys. Last update: February 2021.
unicef-cp11.dataset: DHS, MICS and other national surveys. Last update: February 2021.
